org.usfirst.frc.team2791.robot.subsystems

Class ShakerGear

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
      • org.usfirst.frc.team2791.robot.subsystems.ShakerGear
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.NamedSendable, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Sendable

    public class ShakerGear
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
    This class corresponds to the gear subsystem which uses pistons to actuate the scoring mechanism and a bag motor on a Spark to run the roller intake. There are limit switches in the intake to automatically raise the intake once a gear is pulled in.
    Author:
    team2791: See Robot.java for contact info

      • hasGear

        public boolean hasGear()
        The operator needs the ability to override the switches, so if the switches are disables, this will return false
        Summary state of limit switches in the intake. true = gear inside / false = no gear in intake
        Returns:
        true = gear inside / false = no gear in intake
